title: US Diplomats Beg For Russian Vaccine As COVID Vanishes From America
cleaned_text:
"The News You Need Today…For The World You’ll Live In Tomorrow."

What You Aren’t Being Told About The World You Live In

How The “Conspiracy Theory” Label Was Conceived To Derail The Truth Movement

How Covert American Agents Infiltrate the Internet to Manipulate, Deceive and Destroy Reputations

US Diplomats Beg For Russian Vaccine As COVID Vanishes From

By: Sorcha Faal, and as reported to her Western Subscribers

A comprehensive new Security Council (SC) report circulating in the Kremlin today first noting Speaker Vyacheslav Volodin having instructed the State Duma Foreign Affairs Committee to urge international organizations to review the state of freedom of speech in the United States, says in response to this instruction President Putin called out the ideological divide and widespread censorship of leftist US tech giants, then questioningly stated about them: “These so-called platforms, IT companies, are a serious challenge not only for us… we see what has happened in the United States…and if they behave like that in their country, then how will they treat others, given that they consider themselves exceptional?”.

A question raised by President Putin near immediately answered by leftist US social media giant Facebook, that astonishingly banned all news outlets in Australia, along with this nation’s charities, health organizations and government pages—that was responded to by Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison declaring: “Facebook Attacked A Sovereign Nation – We Will Not Be Intimidated”—then saw Canada siding with Australia and telling Facebook: “We will not be intimidated if this tech giant seeks retribution against us”—that was quickly followed by Poland declaring that it will fine these leftist US tech giants $13.5-million per case for removing ideological content, and them stating: “Poland spent 45 years under Communism…It taught us the value of free speech”.

Moves in defense of free speech being made by Russia, Australia, Canada and Poland coming at the same time leftist American journalists are cheering Ukraine for opening a criminal file against popular YouTuber Anatoly Shariy to charge him with “discrediting the state policy of Ukraine”—then when top American conservative investigative journalist Paul Sperry spoke up about this outrage, leftist tech giant Twitter banned him, to which he replied: “If They Can Harass and Silence a Professional Journalist, They Can Silence Anybody”—a fact proven to grim effect a few hours ago when leftist tech giant Google ordered its YouTube video service to remove a Newsmax interview of President Donald Trump giving remarks about the passing of his close friend Rush Limbaugh—that was joined by YouTube wiping away the thousands of negative comments made against elite Hollywood leftist Kathleen Kennedy, who astonishingly posted a video about empowering women just days after she fired conservative actress Gina Carano for being politically incorrect—after which YouTube then went full Orwellian when it censored all of the videos from an academic conference on the dangers of censorship.

An unprecedented level of mass censorship in America leading many to wonder what these leftist US tech giants and socialist leader Joe Biden are so terrified about their own citizens discovering—the clues for which began to emerge this week when Biden gave an over $200-million blank check to the Communist Chinese dominated and controlled World Health Organization—a blank check coming at the same time US diplomats are begging Russia and other nations to give them COVID vaccines—with these US diplomats specifically asking to be vaccinated with the Sputnik vaccine, while their counterparts in Communist China are being subjected to anal swabs.

With Sputnik V being the first vaccine registered against COVID it’s no surprise these US diplomats are begging to receive it—most specifically because it’s so effective, clinical trials have now begun to decide whether children can be included in the mass vaccination program—in another trial sees 100% of the volunteers developing COVID-19 antibodies from the Russian produced EpiVacCorona vaccine—and further sees international clinical trials of the Sputnik Light single-dose vaccine having now begun in Moscow.

All of which points to what is frantically being kept from the knowledge of the American people by this mass censorship attack—over 330-million people who on a daily average sees 93,813 of them being hospitalized for various reasons (36,241,815 per year) in their nation’s 6,090 hospitals having 924,107 patient beds and over 100,000 intensive care beds—though none of them are being told the truth that today these hospitals have only 62,300 COVID patients, 13,045 of whom are in intensive care, and of them only 4,180 are on ventilators—though in trying to break through this wall of censorship, it does see globally renowned Professor-Doctor Martin Makary at the Johns Hopkins School of Medicine and Bloomberg School of Public Health writing to the American people his open letter “We’ll Have Herd Immunity by April”, wherein he explains that their fast emptying hospitals are because: “Covid cases have dropped 77% in six weeks…Experts should level with the public about the good news”, further sees him admitting the truth that COVID has “a fatality rate of about 0.15%”—and when knowing the fact that the influenza virus has a fatality rate of 1.8%, more than makes clear what is being hidden from the American people by their socialist-leftist overlords, and why. [Note: Some words and/or phrases appearing in quotes in this report are English language approximations of Russian words/phrases having no exact counterpart.]

According to this report, with Communist China being the most active country in propagating disinformation on the origin of the COVID-19, it’s interesting to notice that Facebook tech giant leader Mark Zuckerberg this past week was caught on a video questioning the long-term side effects of modifying DNA in COVID vaccines—vaccines being promoted by Microsoft tech leader Bill Gates, whose Gates Foundation seeded America's COVID-19 policy with multiple catastrophes, and now sees him calling for a THIRD vaccine dose to combat mutations he warns will appear in the coming years.

With America’s distorted COVID policy being run by these censoring leftist tech giant overlords, however, this report notes, it was further interesting to notice this week the article “Thousands Of Service Members Saying No To Covid Vaccine”, that says: “By the thousands, U.S. service members are refusing or putting off the Covid-19 vaccine as frustrated commanders scramble to knock down internet rumors and find the right pitch that will persuade troops to get the shot...Some Army units are seeing as few as one-third agree to the vaccine”—news that came at the same time socialist leader Biden’s top COVID advisor couldn’t answer why California was treating its citizens differently than Florida even though they have identical numbers—then saw Biden’s military leaders warning these vaccine fearful service members: “We cannot make it mandatory yet...But I can tell you we’re probably going to make it mandatory as soon as we can”.

For one to fully appreciate how distorted America has become due to the COVID scamdemic psychological operation, this report details, one need only look at socialist run California, where a fortnight ago the socialist leaders in Long Beach ordered supermarkets to give their workers coronavirus hazard pay—a socialist order having nothing to due with economic reality, thus making it no surprise when America’s largest supermarket chain Kroger immediately closed their two stores in Long Beach—that’s now been followed this week when the socialist leaders of Seattle-Washington made the same order to supermarkets, which caused Kroger to immediately close their two stores in this city—socialist insanity not being seen in the Free State of Florida, where its mask free supermarkets are seeing their business exploding with record sales.

Further not being understood by the American people about this COVID scamdemic psychological operation, this report continues, is it’s being used to hide socialist leader Biden’s war moves meant to enrich himself and the elites supporting him—war moves that see Biden withdrawing President Trump’s restoration of UN sanctions on Iran—that follows Iran having warned Biden that it will block nuclear inspections starting next week if the US doesn’t drop sanctions—have now been joined by Biden saying he’s ready to talk with Iran—further sees Biden preparing to deploy more military forces to Iraq—and most troubling sees Biden making moves to break President Trump’s peace deal with the Taliban so he can keep American military forces in Afghanistan.

To fully understand these war moves being made by Biden, this report explains, one needs remember that President Trump signed an exceptional order lifting sanctions on energy trades between Iran and Afghanistan—an order that enraged American energy giants and their Wall Street backers having oil and gas interests in Central Asia—which makes it no surprise when, on 13 February, the Iran-Afghan energy border crossing was hit with a catastrophic attack that incinerated hundreds of fuel carrying trucks—and saw this devastating attack being immediately followed by Biden promoting an energy pipeline from Central Asia through Afghanistan to India—the same Biden that’s closing down his own nation’s energy pipelines.

Foreign policy of socialist leader Joe Biden is identical (video and photo above) to that of warmongers Bush and Obama.

To how vile and repugnant to all human decency Biden and his godless socialist forces have become, this report concludes, was put on full display this week after the death of American conservative radio icon Rush Limbaugh—that saw these socialists dancing on Limbaugh’s grave within minutes of learning about his death—an act of demonic hatred Biden’s socialist forces further displayed yesterday when they branded babies in their loving mothers’ wombs as nothing more than “pretend life”—though if these vile godless socialists really wanted to know what’s pretend and what isn’t, it should see them looking at their own future—most particularly because President Trump continues to have a higher approval rating than Biden—today sees President Trump’s approval soaring even higher after Pelosi’s failed second sham impeachment—amazingly sees President Trump now being more popular than President Reagan among Republicans—all of which explains why Republican in name only leaders are living in daily dread of President Trump—the most powerful of whom is Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, which makes it interesting with one his top aides having just revealed: “If you told Mitch McConnell that every single day he'd receive a love letter from Donald Trump excoriating his physical appearance and ultimately he ended up with the majority in 2022, he'd take the deal in a heartbeat”—love letters none of these Republicans who turned against President Trump should expect anytime soon, as is now being exampled by his turning down a meeting Nikki Haley requested—and in acknowledging how truly powerful President Trump is, saw Haley releasing an open letter to Republicans entitled “We Can’t Go back To The Pre-Trump GOP. Those Days Are Over, And They Should Be”, wherein, in part, she states:

Where does the Republican Party go from here?

The party that abolished slavery, won the right to vote for women, and beat Soviet communism must continue to be strong and principled to move forward.

But the liberal media doesn’t care about that. It wants to stoke a nonstop Republican civil war.

The media playbook starts with the demand that everyone pick sides about Donald Trump—either love or hate everything about him.

The moment anyone on the right offers the slightest criticism of the 45th president, the media goes berserk: Republicans are trying to have it both ways! It’s a calculated strategy to pit conservatives against one another. It’s also a ridiculous false choice. Real life is never that simple. Someone can do both good and bad things.

People feel strongly about Mr. Trump, but we can acknowledge reality. People on the left, if they’re honest, can find Trump accomplishments they like—a coronavirus vaccine in record time, Middle East peace, more accountability from . People on the right can find fault with Trump actions, including on Jan. 6. Right or left, when people make these distinctions, they’re not trying to have it both ways. They’re using their brains.

Just as important, they’re proving people are more than their party affiliations. If we can’t make judgments beyond whether someone is Republican or Democrat, then can’t face its biggest challenges. We separate into two camps that always hate each other. We become estranged from family and friends over politics.

Is that really what the anti-Trump media wants? Maybe. Hatred and polarization draw attention, ratings and clicks.

But what’s good for them is bad for .

Some Never Trump and Always Trump Republicans also attack anyone who doesn’t join the all-or-nothing chorus.

That’s not how I saw Mr. Trump conduct himself when I worked with him in the White House, where he engaged in internal debates, welcomed disagreements, and at times changed his mind.

Due to our mission’s conflicts with that of those governments, the responses of their ‘agents’ has been a longstanding misinformation/misdirection campaign designed to discredit us, and others like us, that is exampled in numerous places, including HERE.]

[Note: The WhatDoesItMean.com website was created for and donated to the Sisters of Sorcha Faal in 2003 by a small group of American computer experts led by the late global technology guru Wayne Green (1922-2013) to counter the propaganda being used by the West to promote their illegal 2003 invasion of Iraq.]

[Note: The word Kremlin (fortress inside a city) as used in this report refers to Russian citadels, including in , having cathedrals wherein female Schema monks (Orthodox nuns) reside, many of whom are devoted to the mission of the Sisters of Sorcha Faal.]
